column1: #Text=Chong , how long do those torches last ?
#Text=" Chong says : " Uh , about two hours each .
#Text=" Lily says : " And we have five torches , so that 's ten hours !
#Text=" Sokka says : " It does n't work like that if they 're all lit at the same time !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm going to make a map to keep track of exactly where we 've been .
#Text=Then we should be able to solve it like a maze and get through .
